translation.Pick a category text: First, choose a word category, like animals or movies. The computer then randomly selects a secret word from that topic and shows you blanks for each letter of the word.
translation.Guess letters text: Take turns guessing letters. The computer fills in the relevant blank spaces if your guess is correct. If itâ€™s wrong, you lose some health, which empties after eight incorrect guesses.
translation.Win or lose text: You win by guessing all the letters in the word before your health runs out. If the health bar empties before you guess the word, you lose.
